feature.label: Epsilon Concordance
feature.description: This feature provides Concordance, a tool which monitors EMF models in the workspace for non-conformance and dangling inter-model cross references, and notifies the user through the standard Problems view. Concordance also reconciles inter-model cross references when models are moved across the workspace.
